name: commit-intent-detector
description: Automatically detects commit intent when you save files using an external backend API, showing notifications with predicted intent categories.

commitIntentDetector.apiUrl.description: The URL of the backend API endpoint for commit intent analysis

commitIntentDetector.timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for API requests

commitIntentDetector.enabled.description: Enable or disable commit intent detection

commitIntentDetector.debounceDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before processing file saves (prevents rapid API calls)

commitIntentDetector.showStatusBar.description: Show status bar indicator during analysis

commitIntentDetector.allowInsecureSSL.description: Allow insecure SSL certificates (self-signed certificates). WARNING: Only use this for development with localhost. Disables SSL certificate verification.
